participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Active and adventurous, Ethan loves challenges and enjoys outdoor activities. He has a positive outlook and is always eager to try new things.
participant_1.background: I used to play with my toy cars a lot when I was younger, but now I don't have as much time for them. My job is secure and I get paid well. I am allergic to apples yet still eat them. I run marathons. Ariel is my favorite princess.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is introverted yet passionate about her interests. She expresses herself through singing and enjoys spending time with close friends and family.
participant_2.background: I've been lucky enough to avoid any physical altercations in my lifetime. I am a shy person but I love to sing. I have 3 thumbs. My favorite food is macaroni and cheese. I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.

content.text: Hey not much just chilling. You?
Same here, just got back from a run.
Oh nice, how long was it?
It was about 10k. I'm training for a marathon.
Wow that's awesome! I've never been a runner, I'm more of a swimmer.
Oh that's cool too. I've always wanted to try swimming but I'm afraid of drowning.
I used to be the same way but I got over it. It's really fun once you get the hang of it.
Maybe I'll try it out sometime.
You should! It's a great way to stay in shape.
That's good to hear. I could use some relaxation.
Well if you ever want to try it out, let me know. I'd be happy to show you the ropes.
